goal: Master AI Counsel Tab implementation - learn Express.js routing patterns
whatLearned: Learned how to structure Express routes with nested endpoints, separate business logic into services, and use JSON files for data persistence. Understood the pattern: routes → services → data files.
howApplied: Built complete Counsel Tab with 15 API endpoints, 5 agent configurations, and full frontend UI. Now I can build new features faster using this pattern.
evidence: Counsel Tab is live at /counsel with working sessions, agent responses, and decision recording.

goal: Learn SQLite + build Learning System for NOVA Chat
whatLearned: Learned SQL table design, foreign keys, CRUD operations with Node.js sqlite3 library. Built 6 tables (books, courses, skills, insights, mistakes, weekly-goals) with full API.
howApplied: Built complete Learning System in NOVA Chat app. 30+ API endpoints, 900+ lines of frontend code. Functional but needs to be migrated to JSON for nova-dashboard.
evidence: NOVA Chat app has working Learning tab (though in wrong project).

goal: Read 'Lean Startup' and implement one experiment for Studio Shade Co
whatLearned: Build-Measure-Learn loop. MVP testing. Difference between vanity metrics (total visitors) and actionable metrics (conversion rate by channel).
howApplied: Ran SMS vs Email follow-up experiment. SMS: 28% response rate. Email: 12%. Now using SMS as primary follow-up method.
evidence: Spreadsheet with A/B test results. 50 leads split evenly. Clear winner = SMS.

goal: Complete Learning System migration + build Analytics Tab
